org.incava.ijdk.lang

Class StringExt

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.incava.ijdk.lang.StringExt

  • public class StringExt
extends java.lang.Object
    Extensions to the String class. Alternatively, the static methods here are defined as instance objects of the Str class. See documentation of the equivalent methods in Str.
    See Also:
    Str

      • split

        public static java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String str,
                                       char delim,
                                       int max)
        Returns an array of strings split at the character delimiter. Returns null if str is null.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to split
        delim - the character to split at
        max - the maximum number to split
        Returns:
        the array of split strings
